text: Podandrogyne is a genus of flowering plants in the family Cleomaceae. They are closely related to genus Cleome.Cochrane, T. S. (2011). New species of Podandrogyne (Cleomaceae) I. Two species from western Colombia and eastern Panama. Brittonia, 63(1), 87-101. Species include:Podandrogyne. The Plant List. *Podandrogyne brevipedunculata Cochrane *Podandrogyne caucana *Podandrogyne cernua *Podandrogyne chiriquensis *Podandrogyne chocoensis *Podandrogyne coccinea *Podandrogyne decipiens *Podandrogyne densiflora *Podandrogyne formosa *Podandrogyne glabra *Podandrogyne gracilis *Podandrogyne hispidula *Podandrogyne jamesonii (Briq.) Cochrane *Podandrogyne mathewsii *Podandrogyne trichopus (Benth.) H.H.Iltis & Cochrane ==References== Category:Cleomaceae Category:Brassicales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Podandrogyne
